name: The Same Odyssey in Space
description:
The year is 20xx...

The vessel was heading towards new horizons in searching of the next planet to colonize. All seemed to be going pretty o.k. When all of the sudden the ship was caught by an undetected mysterious wormhole...
After regaining consciousness, you noticed that  the ship suffered a malfunction and the time reverted and your ship is being sucked again now you seem to be stuck in a space-time loop so you need to fix the vessel as soon as possible to change it’s course!

How to play:
-Move the character with the arrows on the keyboard to complete the tasks inside the spaceship;
-You can interact with objects by pressing the "Z" button;
